name: let it be light...or not
description:
Submition for GMTK's 2019 Game Jam. 

A barely put together game like Paper Please:

You are the guy in charge of the electricity in a city.

The catch: only one of the three sectors of the city can have electricity at any given time. Is your job to give it or take it from them  

It's only half baked. Didn't fully finished on time.
